评论详情: This top is super cute with good quality material that is soft. I was not expecting the cut-out to only be on one sleeve but that was my mistake. I guess I didn’t look at the picture close enough. The buttons on my shirt are silver not gold and I think I would have preferred gold. I am 5”1 and 160 pounds and ordered a size Medium in the grey which is a great fit. I like it so much I’m going to order in another color.

Im a Large in tshirts so sized up to XL for a roomy fit. Fits perfectly. Bought the brown. Very comfy but not crazy about the gold buttons... They look silver in the description. The buttons are the reason for dropping to 4 stars. Maybe replace w/silver or remove all together. Made well & recommend.
The fit and design are perfect. I really like the fabric also. I'm very pleased with this top. It falls off the shoulder just like it should and then this slightly fitted through the body. Perfect

I bought this shirt in the green/teal and the burgundy.  The shirt's exactly as pictured and is super cute.  The only issue I have is that it runs large.  I'm 4'11 and weight 104 pounds. I bought an XS, which is my usual size, but the shirts are a bit too big.  I'm keeping them because I (stupidly) cut the tags off - and because I really like them - but I'm going to wash and dry them with the hope that they shrink a bit.  Keeping my fingers crossed!!  :)
Quality is great. I wore this top probably five times within two weeks. Sturdy, fits. Great comfort is amazing and I get lots of compliments.
Easy to wear and one of my favorite tops.
Not as great as the pictures. Thin, awkward cut. There’s better options than this.

I bought this sweater in navy and it’s more of a teal. Its a nice color. It works fine, got a medium true to size.(5’9 135 C) I didn’t realize it had gold buttons on the cuffs. Very cheesy. I cut them off and it’s barely noticeable. I will keep it the price point Was good I did wash it and tossed it in the dryer for a few minutes and it looks good. Will be nice for the Fall/winter season.
A bit too large and sleeves too long. Guess I can put in dryer.price was good, so was quality

This sweater is made well. The decorative buttons on the wrist area are a nice touch. I don't feel that the sizing is completely accurate. I would order a size up if you're thinking of ordering this sweater. I went by their sizing guide and the sweater is slightly snug. I don't like certain clothing fitting snug. Otherwise it's a nice sweater.
I had never heard of this brand but have a terrible time finding clothes small enough to fit me and this is perfect all around.

评论概述: Bought this before an extra large fit perfect now an extra large fits like a medium
评论详情: This one did not come with any tags on it unlike the other two
This top is super cute - great material. Fits try to size not tight to body! Love it!

评论概述: Love this top.  Bought it in black.
评论详情: Liked softness fabric weight.  Color.  Loved the silver buttons on the sleeves of the black top.  Ordered the grey and burgundy today.

I really like this shirt.  I ordered the medium.  I am 5'5" and weight 150 lbs.  It's a perfect fit.  It is a soft and stylish shirt.  Very flattering.  The only reason I knocked off a star is because I don't love the buttons.  They are cheaper plastic buttons, and they look like cheap plastic.  It's not enough to make me stop wearing the shirt.  I may even remove the buttons.

This is very cute and comfy, and seems to be very well-made. It washed and dried great, no ironing needed. The sizing was spot on for me. I did mark down one star because unlike the photos, the buttons are gold, not silver.
